languages.text: "Ты говоришь об убогости мысли, которая сделала прошлого мон-кай удобным инстументом в чужих руках. Очевидно, Вольный Торговец не желает подпускать к власти еще одного глупца".

traits.locale_text: "Раболепство не поможет от отсутствия амбиций. Лакей так и остается лакеем, как бы громко не хвалился своим послушанием".

languages.text: "You speak of the same paltriness of thought that made the last mon-keigh such a convenient instrument in another's hands. It is obvious that the Rogue Trader does not want to let another fool come to power."
languages.original_text: "Ты говоришь об убогости мысли, которая сделала прошлого мон-кай удобным инстументом в чужих руках. Очевидно, Вольный Торговец не желает подпускать к власти еще одного глупца".

"You speak of the same paltriness of thought that made the last mon-keigh such a convenient instrument in another's hands. It is obvious that the Rogue Trader does not want to let another fool come to power."

languages.text: 「お前が言っていることは、前のモン＝ケイが他人の手に操られる都合のいい道具になったのと同じ、つまらん思考そのものだ。ローグトレーダーがまた別の愚か者に権力を握らせたくないのは、明白だろう」
languages.original_text: "You speak of the same paltriness of thought that made the last mon-keigh such a convenient instrument in another's hands. It is obvious that the Rogue Trader does not want to let another fool come to power."

traits.locale_text: 「お前が言っていることは、前のモン＝ケイが他人の手に操られる都合のいい道具になったのと同じ、つまらん思考そのものだ。ローグトレーダーがまた別の愚か者に権力を握らせたくないのは、明白だろう」

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht von derselben gedanklichen Armseligkeit, die den letzten Chem-Pan-Sey zu einem so nützlichen Instrument in der Hand eines anderen gemacht hat. Natürlich will {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht zulassen, dass erneut ein Narr an die Macht kommt."
languages.original_text: "You speak of the same paltriness of thought that made the last mon-keigh such a convenient instrument in another's hands. It is obvious that the Rogue Trader does not want to let another fool come to power."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht von derselben gedanklichen Armseligkeit, die den letzten Chem-Pan-Sey zu einem so nützlichen Instrument in der Hand eines anderen gemacht hat. Natürlich will {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} nicht zulassen, dass erneut ein Narr an die Macht kommt."

languages.text: « Cette "qualité" est une faiblesse, celle-là même qui a fait du mon-keigh précédent un outil aussi utile entre les mains d'un autre. Il est évident que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} tient à confier ce pouvoir à une personne compétente, cette fois. »
languages.original_text: "You speak of the same paltriness of thought that made the last mon-keigh such a convenient instrument in another's hands. It is obvious that the Rogue Trader does not want to let another fool come to power."

traits.locale_text: « Cette "qualité" est une faiblesse, celle-là même qui a fait du mon-keigh précédent un outil aussi utile entre les mains d'un autre. Il est évident que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} tient à confier ce pouvoir à une personne compétente, cette fois. »

languages.text: «Esa miserable forma de pensar es la misma que convirtió al último mon-keigh en un conveniente títere. Resulta obvio que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente no desea que otro necio acabe tomando el poder».
languages.original_text: "You speak of the same paltriness of thought that made the last mon-keigh such a convenient instrument in another's hands. It is obvious that the Rogue Trader does not want to let another fool come to power."

traits.locale_text: «Esa miserable forma de pensar es la misma que convirtió al último mon-keigh en un conveniente títere. Resulta obvio que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente no desea que otro necio acabe tomando el poder».

languages.text: “你是指思想的匮乏。正是这种匮乏，才让之前那只猴子沦为了别人手里好用的工具。很明显，行商浪人不打算扶另一个白痴上台。”
languages.original_text: "You speak of the same paltriness of thought that made the last mon-keigh such a convenient instrument in another's hands. It is obvious that the Rogue Trader does not want to let another fool come to power."

traits.locale_text: “你是指思想的匮乏。正是这种匮乏，才让之前那只猴子沦为了别人手里好用的工具。很明显，行商浪人不打算扶另一个白痴上台。”

languages.text: "Son mon-keigh'in başka ellerde elverişli bir maşaya dönüşmesi de aynı aymazlığın eseri. Belli ki Hür Tacir, gücün bir başka aptalın eline geçmesini istemiyor."
languages.original_text: "You speak of the same paltriness of thought that made the last mon-keigh such a convenient instrument in another's hands. It is obvious that the Rogue Trader does not want to let another fool come to power."

traits.locale_text: "Son mon-keighin başka ellerde elverişli bir maşaya dönüşmesi de aynı aymazlığın eseri. Belli ki Hür Tacir, gücün bir başka aptalın eline geçmesini istemiyor."
